build.buildCommand: echo '--- Creating directories ---' && mkdir -p backend/static/fbasaving && echo '--- Copying frontend static to backend/static/fbasaving ---' && cp -rv frontend/fbasaving/static/fbasaving/* backend/static/fbasaving/ && echo '--- Listing backend/static/fbasaving ---' && ls -la backend/static/fbasaving/ && echo '--- Changing to backend dir ---' && cd backend && echo '--- Installing requirements ---' && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && echo '--- Running collectstatic ---' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --clear && echo '--- Listing new STATIC_ROOT (backend/staticfiles) ---' && ls -la staticfiles && echo '--- Build command finished ---'
